title: Casa Nova
description: Explore the nature of being 'in love' by following the story of a tempestuous romance between a young British soldier and a Palestinian Arab girl, set against a background of cultures in conflict.The action moves from 1952 Jerusalem, through the ‘Muddled East’, England and the USA. Finally, a tumultuous saga comes to a full resolution seventeen years later in Nassau, Bahamas.It has nuances of both ‘Romeo and Juliet’ and ‘Westside Story’, with the additional spices of an original plot, and an unexpected, unorthodox conclusion.
author: Van Gerry
